description: Returns the details of the transformer run, based on the Transformer job ID.

parameters.name: transformerJobId
parameters.description: Specifies the unique, system-generated identifier for a transformer run.

parameters.name: transformerId
parameters.description: Specifies the system-assigned unique identifier for the transformer.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: Returns the current state of the transformer job, either running, succeeded, or failed.

nested_items.name: outputFiles
nested_items.description: Returns the location for the output files. If the caller specified a directory for the output, then this contains the full path to the output file, including the file name generated by the service.

nested_items.name: bucketName
nested_items.description: Specifies the name of the Amazon S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: key
nested_items.description: Specifies the Amazon S3 key for the file location.

nested_items.name: message
nested_items.description: Returns an optional error message, which gets populated when the job is not run successfully.
